text: Divo Zadi (25 January 1931 - 1 April 2021) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1953. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Civita Castellana, Italy, from 1989 to 2007. Zadi died on 1 April 2021 at the age of 90.Divo Zadi ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Divo Zadi
